alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Isle of Wight; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Southampton; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 8:27AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hertford, northwestern Gates, southeastern Isle of Wight, and southeastern Southampton Counties, the western City of Chesapeake, the southwestern City of Portsmouth and the City of Suffolk through 915 AM EST... At 827 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Murfreesboro, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gates and Roduco around 840 AM EST. Holland around 845 AM EST. Whaleyville around 850 AM EST. Downtown Suffolk around 855 AM EST. Bowers Hill and Driver around 905 AM EST. Deep Creek, Churchland, Chesapeake and Western Branch around 910 AM EST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Chowan Beach, Topsy, Suffolk Airport, Huntersville, Mapleton, Buckland, Dort, Chuckatuck, Wilroy and Bartonsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for northeastern North Carolina...and southeastern Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Chesapeake; Isle of Wight; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Southampton; Suffolk
